message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.
I appreciate the exclusivity of the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. This is my top price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,025,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. How about we meet in the middle of my original offer and your new offer, at $1,037,500?
